text: Daniel Thomas Lynd (born March 4, 1994) is an American soccer player. ==Career== ===College and amateur=== Lynd played four years of college soccer at the University of Pittsburgh between 2012 and 2015. Lynd also played with Premier Development League sides Pittsburgh Riverhounds U23. ===Professional=== Lynd signed his first professional deal with United Soccer League club Rochester Rhinos on April 22, 2016. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Penfield, New York Category:American soccer players Category:Pittsburgh Panthers men's soccer players Category:Pittsburgh Riverhounds U23 players Category:Rochester Rhinos players Category:Pittsburgh Riverhounds SC players Category:USL League Two players Category:USL Championship players Category:Soccer players from New York (state) Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Daniel Lynd
